explanation: [0-0] Two game characters are standing in a dark room with gray walls and a gray tile floor. The character on the left is wearing a blue hoodie and is covering their mouth in fear. The other character, wearing a green shirt, is crouching by a switch, equally afraid.

[0-10] Then, a black monster walks towards them from a distance. The green character stands up and turns off the switch with their head, and the blue character, upon seeing this, turns the switch back on with their hand. Immediately after, a blue monster appears. The two game characters repeat the same actions twice, during which a pink monster and a white monster also walk towards them.
